TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridPattern/GridPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 해당 또는 접근자를 사용하여 개체의 속성 값에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

related.span: UI 자동화 Grid 컨트롤 패턴 구현

span.span: Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 숨겨진된 행 및 열, 공급자 구현에 따라 로드 될 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 및에 반영 합니다 및 속성.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 숨겨진된 행 및 열이 아직 로드 되지 않은 경우 포함 되지 않습니다.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted. 기본값은 0입니다.The default value is 0. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 이벤트 수신기가 설정 행 또는 열 표에서 항목 되는 같은 표 구조 변경에 대 한 그리드에서 추가 또는 제거 합니다.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 숨겨진된 행 및 열, 공급자 구현에 따라 로드 될 수는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 및에 반영 합니다 및 속성.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 숨겨진된 행 및 열이 아직 로드 되지 않은 경우에 속성에 반영 되지 않습니다.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. 기본값은 0입니다.The default value is 0. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 이벤트 수신기가 설정 행 또는 열 표에서 항목 되는 같은 표 구조 변경에 대 한 그리드에서 추가 또는 제거 합니다.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]
